title: Yes, India’s defence exports are booming, but guess who’s the biggest importer
comments: They're probably running low on supplies. It turns out that bombing kids in Gaza, maintaining the intensity of operations in Yemen and Syria, and arming American "mental health patients" with assault rifles to shoot school kids takes a toll on even the mightiest military-industrial complex in history.
Hmm..., if they fund a really good zombie apocalypse movie or a war movie that glories uncle Sam I'm sure the imports should keep on increasing.
